```{r, results="asis"}
source("R/latex.R")
x <- mtcars[1:4, 1:5]
init_latex(x) |>  
  style_columns_latex(1:2, halign = "c", bold = TRUE) |>
  style_rows_latex(c(1, 4), bg = "pink", italic = TRUE) |>
  style_columns_latex(4, halign = "r", fg = "blue", wd = "4cm") |>
  style_cells_latex(1:2, 1:2, bg = "black") |>
  style_cells_latex(4, 4, monospace = TRUE, bold = TRUE) |>
  cat()
```
